name: Hero Human Man-Pirate
description:
In Hero Human Man-Pirate, you are a Hero Human Man-Pirate. Battle your way through rough seas to reclaim your lost love.

This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 40 by Jimmy Cushnie, Ben Longley, Brooke Morgan, Corwin Myrdden, Sierra Spoar and Duke Sheikh.

This game might seem impossible, but it's not! It's just very very very very hard. Here's proof that it's beatable, in the form of the world record speed run:

Warning: this video may contain story spoilers!
